column4: ActionParsnip; How am I suppose to change to a diffrent directory?
you might want to read up on a bash tutorial or 2 to learn the basics.  Rember Directory names ARE case senesetive also.
some times you jsut have to spend an hr and read through some very basic beginner guides to learn what people are talking about. IRC is not a replacent for that.
